failure.label: Complications
failure.value: On a miss, the MC holds 1, and can spend it to have you be there already, but somehow pinned, caught or trapped.

partial.label: Partial Success
partial.value:
On a 7–9, hold 1.

At any time, either you or the MC can spend your hold to have you already be there, with the proper tools and knowledge, with or without any clear explanation why.

success.label: Success
success.value:
On a 10+, hold 1+1.

At any time, either you or the MC can spend your hold to have you already be there, with the proper tools and knowledge, with or without any clear explanation why. If your hold was 1+1, take +1forward now.
